metadata.Title: CVE-2023-20592 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
Improper or unexpected behavior of the INVD instruction in some AMD CPUsmay allow an attacker with a malicious hypervisor to affect cache linewrite-back behavior of the CPU leading to a potential loss of guest virtualmachine (VM) memory integrity.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-20592` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

amd64-microcode - 3.20220411.1ubuntu3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: amd64-microcode package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20220411.1ubuntu3.2').
